## How to view and access Curricula as a learner?

Curricula allows users to switch the role between admin/instructor and learner
if they have been assigned as these roles, so that users can not only serve as
the admin/instructor of courses but also experience learning as a learner.

Alex is the LMS admin in an organisation and he has been assigned as the
application admin of Curricula. He wants to view **Home** , **Discover** ,
**Course** , **Task** , **Calendar** , **My profile** , and **My team** the
way learners do. Now let’s see how Alex will perform the actions in the
learner role.

To perform the actions in the learner role, Alex can click his photo in the
upper-right corner and selects **Switch to learner**.

***Note** : If Alex hasn’t been assigned as the learner role, he can navigate
to MaivenPoint Online Services > **Account management** to perform the
operation. For details on how to assign roles for users, refer to Add users to
manage or use your MaivenPoint services. If Alex has no permissions for this
operation, he can contact the tenant owner or service admin for assistance.
